value:
Whatever I may lack in brute strength,
I can make up for with agility. Don't
count me out of any match!

We're very familiar with sumo out on
the plains. Sometimes we even have a
match to settle disputes.

So, Rinkah is representing the Flame
Tribe? I'll have to do my best for the
Lorca, then. Won't be easy.

I thought Florina might be interested
in sumo, after how well she took to
being a ninja. I was wrong.

The Flame Tribe can teach us a lot
about bravery and strength. They
always stand their ground.

I'm Lyn. I've just come from the
festival of flames that's happening
at $Nf's castle.

Give it your all, right until the end.
That's the key to victory.

Looks like I've hit my stride. Maybe
sumo is for me after all!
What a terrible match...

There's a scorching wind blazing at
my back. I feel the heat coursing
through me. It's invigorating!

I'm Lyn. I've been training hard for
this festival of flames. I'm here to
do the Lorca proud.

Phew... They weren't kidding when
they called it the festival of flames.
Every muscle in my body's on fire.$k$pI have to thank you for the invitation,
though. I've learned a lot by being
here, $Nu.$k$pTime and again I've seen that raw
strength isn't enough to win. If it
were, I'd never have stood a chance.$k$pBut I can hold my own with Hector
and Eliwood because I've got agility
and technique.$k$pSkill on its own isn't enough either,
though. If you really want to win,
you need heart most of all.$k$pThanks to you, I've got plenty of that.
So next time you're hosting a festival
of flames, let me know. I'll be there.
I'll demonstrate my technique.
Do not underestimate me.
You'll see my strength!
The real fight starts now!
It can't be...
This garb may be suited to this manner of combat, but it's no match for a cold breeze.
The match hasn't started yet! Pushing me now would be unsportsmanlike.
We of the Lorca tribe held competitions similar to sumo. The goal was to determine the strongest among us.
Just because it's a festival, there's no need to be formal. We can cut loose.
I must embody the Flame Tribe's blazing will to fight!
It's too bad Eliwood and Hector aren't participating. I'm sure they would have a great time, too.
I'll spar with you, but don't underestimate me. I get plenty of training in.
Good move.
Where shall I strike?
Toward victory.
